name: mBIT (Multiple Brain Integration Techniques) Model
description: The mBIT (Multiple Brain Integration Techniques) Coaching Model helps clients align their head, heart, and gut intelligences for coherent decision-making. It supports values-based leadership, resilience, and authentic action.

decision_issue.title: What decision are you facing?
decision_issue.description: Define the specific decision or issue to be addressed

misalignment_areas.title: What feels misaligned right now?
misalignment_areas.description: Identify areas where there is internal conflict or misalignment

logical_options.title: What are the logical options?
logical_options.description: Explore rational, logical perspectives from head intelligence

information_needed.title: What information do you need?
information_needed.description: Identify what additional information would help with decision-making

emotional_response.title: What do you feel about these options?
emotional_response.description: Tune into emotional and feeling responses from heart intelligence

values_alignment.title: What aligns with your values?
values_alignment.description: Explore how options align with core values and beliefs

instincts_intuitions.title: What instincts or intuitions do you have?
instincts_intuitions.description: Access gut intelligence and instinctual responses

deeper_knowing.title: What feels right at a deeper level?
deeper_knowing.description: Connect with deeper intuitive knowing and wisdom

three_brain_agreement.title: Where is there agreement across head, heart, and gut?
three_brain_agreement.description: Identify areas of alignment between all three intelligences

congruent_action.title: How can you act congruently?
congruent_action.description: Plan how to act in alignment with all three intelligences

aligned_steps.title: What specific steps will you take from this alignment?
aligned_steps.description: Define concrete actions based on integrated intelligence

support_needed.title: What support will you need?
support_needed.description: Identify what support or resources are needed for implementation
